title: In a "Ghost Game"
body:
I've happen into what I think is a ghost game. My client tells me to reconnect to a game that has ended, I've relogged and tried many things. After some reading I found that I have to leave the client open for several hours. In which I've have and now comes up with a in-game time of "-|-"... When I try to reconnect, I get can not connect game. According to OP.GG i'm not in an "active" game. What can I do?

It seems like other people have been having the same issue, I've been logged into the client for about 2 and a half hours.

replies.body: Yeeeeeep that sounds like a ghost game. Typically about 3-4 hours is plenty of time for these issues to clear up, have you been able to get back in a game yet?
